main_definition: In general context, 'vanilla' refers to the ordinary or standard version of something without any additional features or enhancements.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A basic flavor for ice cream and other desserts
meanings_and_examples.example: I ordered a scoop of vanilla ice cream with sprinkles on top.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Standard or unaltered sexual activity without any particular kinks, fetishes, or special techniques
meanings_and_examples.example: They decided to keep their relationship 'vanilla' because they both preferred simplicity in their intimacy.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Unassuming and plain appearance or character
meanings_and_examples.example: She has a vanilla personality; she is humble, modest, and doesn't seek attention.
